sectionText: Topic: Wealth and Poverty in Korea: What it means to be rich (or not)  This section is offered through the CIC Course Share Program hosted by University of Michigan and will be video-conference taught for participating universities.  Class will meet from Jan. 17 - April 18, with no class meetings the weeks of Feb. 25 and March 20 .  CLASS WILL MEET IN 4057 LH.
